column1: Living with her sister in Storm Peaks ; this ugly inscriptionist yearns to discover their destiny.
Their dark skin is guarded by a cloth white dog outfit that  destroys the appearance coherency with  their abnormaly large cheek.
Living with his mother in Howling Fjord ; this fair skinner desires to find their past.
They wear a commoner red dog outfit that was passed down from their parents. It does not suit their terrifyingly big arms.
Worked as a slave in Timeless Isle ; this dominant Goblin craves to vanquish their past.
They wear a plate blue troll outfit which looks familiar. It perfectly contrasts their absurdly small cheek.
Coming from Silverpine Forest ; this murderous cook hopes to destroy their family.
They wear a luxurious rainbow legplate which bears a royal crest. It destroys the appearance coherency with  their absurdly large arms.
Originating from Wintergrasp ; this peaceful skinner yearns to learn the truth about their past.
They wear a spoiled green maid outfit which  perfectly fits their big eyes.
Grew up in Zuldazar ; this pessimistic cleaner aspires to profit from their real family.
Their old skin is covered by a mail orange troll outfit that resembles the gear of the late king. It perfectly contrasts their small nosedrills.
Hailing from Duskwood ; this quarrelsome tailor craves to unearth their family.
Their pale skin is guarded bya luxurious red cat outfit that resembles the gear of the late king. It does not suit their relatively big mouth.
Moved to  Moonglade ; this bossy Mage campaigns to conquer their family.
Their old skin is protected by a spoiled dark dog outfit that resembles the gear of the late king. It perfectly fits their huge hands.
Belonging to the poorest family of Townlong Steppes ; this murderous cleaner plans to destroy their true destiny.
Their apparel consists of a commoner hazel suggestive outfit that  looks absurd compared to their gigantic ears.
Born in Tirisfal Glades ; this self-controlling tavern worker anticipates to conquer their rage.
Their body is covered by a woolen red outfit that looks like it was stolen from a dungeon; but compliments their abnormaly large ears.
